paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on Taiwanese patients with ovarian cancer.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient carried both a BRCA1 germline mutation and a BRCA2 somatic mutation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified as a somatic mutation.
key_quotes: Five novel frameshift mutations were identified, including four somatic variants (BRCA1 p.S242fs, BRCA1 p.F989fs, BRCA1 p.G1738fs, and BRCA2 p.D1451fs) and a germline variant (BRCA2 p.E260fs).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient carried both a BRCA1 germline mutation and a BRCA2 somatic mutation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified as a germline mutation.
key_quotes: Five novel frameshift mutations were identified, including four somatic variants (BRCA1 p.S242fs, BRCA1 p.F989fs, BRCA1 p.G1738fs, and BRCA2 p.D1451fs) and a germline variant (BRCA2 p.E260fs).

patients.phenotype: one with clear cell carcinoma and the other with serous carcinoma

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The recurrent BRCA2 VUS p.S1946P—deemed to be pathogenic owing to its occurrence in two sisters with ovarian cancer.
The recurrent BRCA2 VUS p.S1946P—deemed to be pathogenic owing to its occurrence in two sisters with ovarian cancer.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a missense mutation located nearby the BRC motif, which is essential for BRCA2-mediated recombination repair.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is rare in healthy subjects of the Taiwanese population.
key_quotes: The recurrent BRCA2 VUS p.S1946P—deemed to be pathogenic owing to its occurrence in two sisters with ovarian cancer.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of pathogenic BRCA1/2 variants identified in the study.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
